short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for potential rug pulls on pump.fun for Solana-based memecoins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check for potential rug pulls on all Solana-based memecoins on the website pump.fun, giving you metrics and all necessary data for a chosen coin, all you need to do is right click( context-menu ) any coin 🚦IMAGE🚦 on the website.

The popup modal that shows contains the specified coin's intel such as:

💲-The coin name.
🏠-the address- you have the ability to copy it.
🔍-You can choose to check the coin on https://rugcheck.xyz/ with one click.
📊- View metrics such as if the coin is mutable?, freezable? and mintable?.
📉- View the top10 holders percentage.
💀-Scam Status
🕸-Social media links of the coin if any
